model_card.name: xAI: Grok 3 Mini
model_card.description: A lightweight model that thinks before responding. Fast, smart, and great for logic-based tasks that do not require deep domain knowledge. The raw thinking traces are accessible.

request.prompt: In a single HTML file named index.html, create a simple tic tac toe game, when the game is finished, please make some original twist as finish animation !
